analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x80f7fc09a7f3fa7edca847b118aaeffee2b9b43b.sol:
	Contract BUYGOODSWITHCRYPTODOTCOM has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x80f7fc09a7f3fa7edca847b118aaeffee2b9b43b.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0x80f7fc09a7f3fa7edca847b118aaeffee2b9b43b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/19/0x80f7fc09a7f3fa7edca847b118aaeffee2b9b43b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/19/0x80f7fc09a7f3fa7edca847b118aaeffee2b9b43b.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
